nws.name: Overnight
nws.detailedForecast: Cloudy. Low around 45, with temperatures rising to around 48 overnight. Southeast wind 5 to 8 mph, with gusts as high as 16 mph.

nws.name: Tuesday
nws.shortForecast: Partly Sunny then Chance Rain Showers
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers between 3pm and 5pm. Partly sunny. High near 75, with temperatures falling to around 73 in the afternoon. South southeast wind 10 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph.

nws.name: Tuesday Night
nws.shortForecast: Chance Light Rain then Mostly Clear
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 8pm, then a chance of rain showers between 8pm and midnight. Mostly clear. Low around 41, with temperatures rising to around 45 overnight. West southwest wind 15 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

nws.name: Wednesday
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 65. Southwest wind 9 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

nws.name: Wednesday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 34. East wind 7 to 14 mph.

nws.name: Thursday
nws.shortForecast: Chance Light Rain then Chance Rain And Snow
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 3pm, then a chance of rain and snow. Partly sunny, with a high near 49. North wind 14 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nws.name: Thursday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Rain and snow likely. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 19. Northwest wind around 20 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

nws.name: Friday
nws.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 35. Northwest wind 10 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

nws.name: Friday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 17. North northwest wind around 7 mph.

nws.name: Saturday
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow. Mostly sunny, with a high near 40. North northwest wind 7 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

nws.name: Saturday Night
nws.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Snow then Mostly Clear
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow before midnight. Mostly clear, with a low around 15. North northwest wind around 8 mph.

nws.name: Sunday
nws.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 36. North northwest wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

nws.name: Sunday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 14. North wind 5 to 8 mph.

nws.name: Monday
nws.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 41. East wind 5 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 17 mph.
